description:
The goddess of love pays a visit to Brunhild, calling herself Touya`s older sister, Mochizuki Karen. Apparently she came there to refresh (enjoy a vacation) because Touya is so surrounded by love.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Isekai no Ane, Soshite Hatsukoi Kirakira.
Sister from Another World and a Sparkling First Love
Sœur d’un autre monde et premier amour étincelant
異世界の姉, そして初恋キラキラ.
